title: Inside the Parker - Remembering Hank Aaron; Cooperstown Shutout; Rob's HOF Ballot; The Curt Schilling Debate
itunes:title: Inside the Parker - Remembering Hank Aaron; Cooperstown Shutout; Rob's HOF Ballot; The Curt Schilling Debate
description:
This week on Inside the (Rob) Parker, Rob remembers the life and hall of fame career of all-time great Hank Aaron, discusses zero players receiving enough votes to get elected to the Hall of Fame, reveals his ballot, the surprising pushback against the universal DH by the MLB Player's Union,

Guests: Fox Sports Radio's Bernie Fratto debates Rob over Curt Schilling's Hall of Fame case; Chicago Baseball Writer Mark Gonzales on zero players being elected to the Hall of Fame in 2020, and reveals his ballot.

Click here to subscribe and download all of the latest Inside the Parker podcasts and follow Rob on Twitter!!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
